20110121150730.000|20110121150730.000|CC1|HER.                            
20110121150730.000|20110121150731.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THIS MORNING       
20110121150731.000|20110121150735.000|CC1|GIFFORDS LEAVES HERE HEADED TO  
20110121150735.000|20110121150736.000|CC1|AN AIR FORCE BASE IN AN         
20110121150736.000|20110121150737.000|CC1|AMBULANCE.                      
20110121150737.000|20110121150742.000|CC1|A MEDACAC FLIGHT WILL TAKE HER  
20110121150742.000|20110121150745.000|CC1|TO HOUSTON WHERE SHE'LL BE TAKEN
20110121150745.000|20110121150748.000|CC1|TO HERMANN HOSPITAL.            
20110121150748.000|20110121150750.000|CC1|>> HER REHABILITATION WILL FOCUS
20110121150750.000|20110121150752.000|CC1|ON GETTING FUNCTIONALITY BACK   
20110121150752.000|20110121150754.000|CC1|AND DOING ACTIVITIES OF DAILY   
20110121150754.000|20110121150754.000|CC1|LIVING.                         
20110121150754.000|20110121150755.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GIFFORDS WILL BE   
20110121150755.000|20110121150757.000|CC1|THE FINAL SURVIVOR TO LEAVE THE 
20110121150757.000|20110121150757.000|CC1|HOSPITAL.

20110121150759.000|20110121150801.000|CC1|SUSPECTED GUNMAN JARED LEE

20110121150816.000|20110121150819.000|CC1|THE GROUND AND USED HIS BODY TO

20110121151132.000|20110121151135.000|CC1|>> YOUR FEMORAL ARTERY HAD BEEN
